Question
========

The cross table below shows how two Utrecht constituencies voted voted during the past referendum on the European Constitution: for, against or blank.

  ---------------- ------ ------- -------- For Against Blank Electoral district 1 183 161 12 Electoral district 2 212 228 16 Total 395 398 28 ---------------- ------ ------- --------

What percentage of *non-blank* voters in both districts combined were in favor of the constitution?

Answerlist
----------

* 46.4%
* 48.6%
* 49.8%
* 50.4%
* 53.7%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 46.4%: Incorrect
* 48.6%: Incorrect
* 49.8%: Correct
* 50.4%: Incorrect
* 53.7%: Incorrect
